title: Sunny Side Down: A Collection of Tales of Mere Existence
description: Lev is just like any other young, urban sub-professional who sees the world through inch-thick goggles of self-consciousness. Armed only with insecurity, doubt, and a seemingly inadvisable tenacity, Lev trudges through his days furiously analyzing himself and the world around him, desperately trying to figure out where he fits in.If you have ever felt like a perpetual square peg in a world of round holes, you have found a kindred spirit.
author: Levni Yilmaz
